app_name: Groups Control Groups Messenger Apps Talk to Strangers Anichat
app_description: Talk to strangers: Instantly get connected to chat with a new real person and make new friends. Endless possibilities. Only REAL persons! No bots! No fake accounts! Try it and meet new people now it s quickly easy and fun! Instant private chat: Select a new user to talk with instantly. Free and unlimited. Choose the gender of who you want to initiate a chat with available for premium subscribers only . Private 1 on 1 chat no other user could see what you share. Only real persons: Talk with real people only. No fake accounts and no bots. Only real users! Chat around the world: Our service is available worldwide so you could make friends across seas and limits. Be whoever you want: You choose how others would see you so be who you want to be. change your profile pic or your nickname through app settings. We don t share any details about you besides your nickname your age and your profile pic. Keep new friends close: Stay connected with new friends through the app no need to share any personal details. You can mark users as favorite to manage your friends list easier. Media sharing: Besides text we currently support sharing of images and videos. One time media share all images and videos you share could be seen only once. Screenshot notification: If the other side takes a screenshot of the chat you would be instantly notified. Report Block: You can always report a user that you believe violates any of the app policies and we would check it out ASAP. You can easily block any user so they would not be able to contact you again. It s a FREE download easy and fun so check it out NOW! Auto renewable subscription information: Subscription starting 5.99 each month. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase Subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and identify the cost of the renewal Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto renewal may be turned off by going to the user s Account Settings after purchase No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period Any unused portion of a free trial period if offered will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication. If you want to disable auto renewable subscription you can use this tutorial: https: support.apple.com en il HT202039 Privacy Policy can be found here: http: privacypolicy.anichatapp.com Terms of service could be found here: http: termsofuse.anichatapp.com If you have any questions or feedback please use our customer support page http: contactus.anichatapp.com. Your feedback is highly valuable for us!
